entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -34.6°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.3°C
Wind: NNE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
